poc_project.data package¶

Submodules¶

poc_project.data.connection module¶

This application file is responsible to provide the complete connection related activities around the database.

poc_project.data.connection.connect(file_name: str = 'db.sqlite3') → Engine[source]¶

Establishes a connection to a SQLite database.

Parameters:

file_name (str, optional) – The name of the SQLite database file. Default is “db.sqlite3”.

Returns:

An Engine object representing the established connection to the SQLite database.

Return type:

sqlalchemy.engine.Engine

Notes

  • The connection is configured with autocommit=True, meaning changes are automatically committed to the database.

  • The check_same_thread=False setting allows the connection to be used across multiple threads.

poc_project.data.connection.get_connection_path() → Path[source]¶

Returns the path to the directory where the SQLite database file is located.

Returns:

The path to the directory containing the database file.

Return type:

pathlib.Path

Module contents¶

deep_learning_with_pytorch.data¶

This module is resposible to provide the handful options to connect with database. It is simple and clean module with in the application.
